lyrics.lyric: Lalalalala-La
lyrics.romanization: Lalalalala-La

lyrics.lyric: La-Lalalala-LaLaaa
lyrics.romanization: La-Lalalala-LaLaaa

lyrics.lyric: シングルサイズの部屋で1人きり
lyrics.translation: 独自一人蜷缩在这弹丸之地
lyrics.romanization: shi n gu ru sa i zu no he ya de hi to ri ki ri

lyrics.lyric: 思い出すのはあなたとの暮らし
lyrics.translation: 脑海早已被与你的故事占据
lyrics.romanization: o mo i da su no wa a na ta to no ku ra shi

lyrics.lyric: 物語の舞台はビルが群れる
lyrics.translation: 思绪逐渐飘向那遥远的海岸
lyrics.romanization: mo no ga ta ri no bu ta i wa bi ru ga mu re ru

lyrics.lyric: 大都会を遠くに見る海辺の街
lyrics.translation: 就在那车水马龙的大都市中
lyrics.romanization: da i to ka i wo to o ku ni mi ru u mi be no ma chi

lyrics.lyric: Lalalalala-La
lyrics.romanization: Lalalalala-La

lyrics.lyric: La-Lalalala-LaLaaa
lyrics.romanization: La-Lalalala-LaLaaa

lyrics.lyric: 初めて会った日のことだって
lyrics.translation: 初见那日所发生的一切
lyrics.romanization: ha ji me te a tta hi no ko to da tte

lyrics.lyric: 今もまだちゃんと覚えてる
lyrics.translation: 直到现在也还历历在目
lyrics.romanization: i ma mo ma da cha n to o bo e te ru

lyrics.lyric: フォーマルなシャツ、ジャケットが
lyrics.translation: 精致的衬衫与夹克
lyrics.romanization: foo ma ru na sha tsu、ja ke tto ga

lyrics.lyric: 少し不似合いなあなた
lyrics.translation: 怎么整理也有些不合身
lyrics.romanization: su ko shi fu ni a i na a na ta

lyrics.lyric: 言葉数は少なくて
lyrics.translation: 先生你总是沉默寡言
lyrics.romanization: ko to ba ka zu wa su ku na ku te

lyrics.lyric: いつも厳しくて叱られてばかりで
lyrics.translation: 一开口便是严厉的苛责
lyrics.romanization: i tsu mo ki bi shi ku te shi ka ra re te ba ka ri de

lyrics.lyric: 機械仕掛けのこころを
lyrics.translation: 这机械一般的内心
lyrics.romanization: ki ka i shi ka ke no ko ko ro wo

lyrics.lyric: 無力さが包んでいった
lyrics.translation: 被无力感层层笼罩
lyrics.romanization: mu ryo ku sa ga tsu tsu n de i tta

lyrics.lyric: でも､
lyrics.translation: 但是
lyrics.romanization: de mo、

lyrics.lyric: あなたを知りたくて
lyrics.translation: 但我还是想要了解你
lyrics.romanization: a na ta wo shi ri ta ku te

lyrics.lyric: なにもかも知っていたくて
lyrics.translation: 想要去了解你的一切
lyrics.romanization: na ni mo ka mo shi tte i ta ku te

lyrics.lyric: だけど教えてなんて
lyrics.translation: 可得到的回应仅仅是
lyrics.romanization: da ke do o shi e te na n te

lyrics.lyric: 言えずに1人そっと夜に祈る
lyrics.translation: 独自站在夜色中祈愿
lyrics.romanization: i e zu ni hi to ri so tto yo ru ni i no ru

lyrics.lyric: 少しでも分かりたくて
lyrics.translation: 哪怕一丝一毫也好 我只想要了解你
lyrics.romanization: su ko shi de mo wa ka ri ta ku te

lyrics.lyric: そんな日々を繰り返した
lyrics.translation: 那样的日子一次又一次的重复
lyrics.romanization: so n na hi bi wo ku ri ka e shi ta

lyrics.lyric: Lalalalala-La La-Lalalala-LaLaaa
lyrics.romanization: Lalalalala-La La-Lalalala-LaLaaa

lyrics.lyric: Lalalalala-La La-Lalalala-LaLaaa
lyrics.romanization: Lalalalala-La La-Lalalala-LaLaaa

lyrics.lyric: それでも時折見せてくれた
lyrics.translation: 尽管如此 有时也能看到
lyrics.romanization: so re de mo to ki o ri mi se te ku re ta

lyrics.lyric: 穏やかなあの表情も
lyrics.translation: 先生你那温和的表情
lyrics.romanization: o da ya ka na a no hyo u jo u mo

lyrics.lyric: 1度だけ浮かべた涙も
lyrics.translation: 那仅仅流露一次的感情
lyrics.romanization: i chi do da ke u ka be ta na mi da mo

lyrics.lyric: 隠しきれずにこぼれてた
lyrics.translation: 再也无法掩饰泪水充盈双目
lyrics.romanization: ka ku shi ki re zu ni ko bo re te ta

lyrics.lyric: 優しさだった (あの日もそうだった)
lyrics.translation: 温柔夺眶而出 即便是那些日子也是如此啊
lyrics.romanization: ya sa shi sa da tta

lyrics.lyric: あれは2人最後の思い出
lyrics.translation: 这便是我们最后的回忆
lyrics.romanization: a re wa fu ta ri sa i go no o mo i de

lyrics.lyric: 暗闇で
lyrics.translation: 在黑夜中
lyrics.romanization: ku ra ya mi de

lyrics.lyric: この手を握り返して
lyrics.translation: 握紧彼此的手
lyrics.romanization: ko no te wo ni gi ri ka e shi te

lyrics.lyric: 笑ってくれた
lyrics.translation: 对着彼此展露笑容
lyrics.romanization: wa ra tte ku re ta

lyrics.lyric: あなたはもういない
lyrics.translation: 如今你却从我身边消失
lyrics.romanization: a na ta wa mo u i na i

lyrics.lyric: 今でも聞きたくて
lyrics.translation: 现在也还是想听到
lyrics.romanization: i ma de mo ki ki ta ku te

lyrics.lyric: もう一度聞かせて欲しくって
lyrics.translation: 想要再次听到先生你用那
lyrics.romanization: mo u i chi do ki ka se te ho shi ku tte

lyrics.lyric: 優しくて不器用な
lyrics.translation: 温柔又略显笨拙的声音来
lyrics.romanization: ya sa shi ku te bu ki yo u na

lyrics.lyric: あなたの声を厳しい言葉を
lyrics.translation: 对我说出严厉的话语什么呀
lyrics.romanization: a na ta no ko e wo ki bi shi i ko to ba wo

lyrics.lyric: なんて願う
lyrics.translation: 我是多么希望
lyrics.romanization: na n te ne ga u

lyrics.lyric: この気持ちはどんな名前なんですか
lyrics.translation: 这份心情究竟该如何形容
lyrics.romanization: ko no ki mo chi wa do n na na ma e na n de su ka

lyrics.lyric: またいつもと同じように
lyrics.translation: 就像往常那样就好
lyrics.romanization: ma ta i tsu mo to o na ji yo u ni

lyrics.lyric: 私の事叱ってよ
lyrics.translation: 对我说些苛责的话语吧
lyrics.romanization: wa ta shi no ko to shi ka tte yo

lyrics.lyric: ミスター
lyrics.translation: 先生
lyrics.romanization: mi su taa

lyrics.romanization: Lalalalala-La La-Lalalala-LaLaaa
